009
010package Ch13_ColorImages;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.color.quantize.KMeansClusteringQuantizer.DefaultIterations;
013import static imagingbook.common.color.quantize.KMeansClusteringQuantizer.InitialClusterMethod.MostFrequent;
014import static imagingbook.common.color.quantize.KMeansClusteringQuantizer.InitialClusterMethod.Random;
015
016import ij.ImagePlus;
017import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
018import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
019import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
020import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
021import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
022import imagingbook.common.color.quantize.ColorQuantizer;
023import imagingbook.common.color.quantize.KMeansClusteringQuantizer;
024import imagingbook.common.color.quantize.MedianCutQuantizer;
025import imagingbook.common.color.quantize.OctreeQuantizer;
026
027/**
028 * <p>
029 * ImageJ plugin, performs Median Cut color quantization using
030 * {@link MedianCutQuantizer}. See Sec. 13.4.2 (Algs. 13.1-3) of [1] for
031 * details.
032 * </p>
033 * <p>
034 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
035 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
036 * </p>
037 * 
038 * @author WB
039 * @version 2022/11/05
040 */
041public class Quantize_Color_Image implements PlugInFilter {
042        
043        enum QuantizeMethod {
044                MedianCut,
045                Octree,
046                OctreeQuick,
047                KMeansRandom,
048                KMeansMostFrequent
049        }
050        
051        private static QuantizeMethod METHOD = QuantizeMethod.MedianCut;
052        private static int NCOLORS = 16;
053        private static boolean CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE = true; 
054        private static boolean CREATE_RGB_IMAGE = false;
055        private static boolean LIST_COLOR_MAP = false;
056        
057        private ImagePlus im;
058        
059        @Override
060        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
061                this.im = im;
062                return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
063        }
064        
065        @Override
066        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
067                
068                if (!runDialog())
069                        return;
070                
071                ColorProcessor cp = (ColorProcessor) ip;
072                ColorQuantizer quantizer = makeQuantizer((int[])cp.getPixels());
073                
074                int nCols = quantizer.getColorMap().length;
075                
076                String title = im.getShortTitle() + "-" + METHOD.toString();
077                
078                if (CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE) {
079                        // quantize to an indexed color image
080                        ByteProcessor qip = quantizer.quantize(cp);
081                        ImagePlus imp = new ImagePlus(title + "-IDX-" + nCols, qip);
082                        imp.setTypeToColor256();
083                        imp.show();
084                }
085                
086                if (CREATE_RGB_IMAGE) {
087                        // quantize to a full-color RGB image
088                        int[] rgbPix = quantizer.quantize((int[])cp.getPixels());
089                        ColorProcessor rgbIp = new ColorProcessor(cp.getWidth(), cp.getHeight(), rgbPix);
090                        new ImagePlus(title + "-RGB-" + nCols , rgbIp).show();
091                }
092                
093                if (LIST_COLOR_MAP) {
094                        quantizer.listColorMap();
095                }
096        }
097        
098        private ColorQuantizer makeQuantizer(int[] pixels) {
099                switch (METHOD) {
100                case MedianCut: 
101                        return new MedianCutQuantizer(pixels, NCOLORS);
102                case Octree: 
103                        return new OctreeQuantizer(pixels, NCOLORS, false);
104                case OctreeQuick: 
105                        return new OctreeQuantizer(pixels, NCOLORS, true);
106                case KMeansRandom: 
107                        return new KMeansClusteringQuantizer(pixels, NCOLORS, Random, DefaultIterations);
108                case KMeansMostFrequent: 
109                        return new KMeansClusteringQuantizer(pixels, NCOLORS, MostFrequent, DefaultIterations);
110                }
111                return null;
112        }
113        
114        private boolean runDialog() {
115                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
116                gd.addEnumChoice("Quantization method", METHOD);
117                gd.addNumericField("No. of colors (1,..,256)", NCOLORS, 0);
118                gd.addCheckbox("Create indexed color image", CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE);
119                gd.addCheckbox("Create quantized RGB image", CREATE_RGB_IMAGE);
120                gd.addCheckbox("List quantized colors", LIST_COLOR_MAP);
121                
122                gd.showDialog();
123                if (gd.wasCanceled())
124                        return false;
125                
126                METHOD = gd.getNextEnumChoice(QuantizeMethod.class);
127                int nc = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
128                nc = Math.min(nc, 256);
129                nc = Math.max(1, nc);           
130                NCOLORS = nc;
131                CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE = gd.getNextBoolean();
132                CREATE_RGB_IMAGE = gd.getNextBoolean();
133                LIST_COLOR_MAP = gd.getNextBoolean();
134                return true;
135        }
136}
